attributes.action: ban second home allowances for home county mp's and open a hostel for all other mps to use whilst in London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: home county mps should commute ,in most cases there will be no security risk.Also they should be limited to a 9-5 working day with  6 weeks holiday a year and a decent basic wage.this will stop all abuses of the citizens who pay for them

rejection.details: MPs' expenses and allowances are a matter for direct communication with Parliament rather than the Government.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
